title: Ryze's icon looks too much like Shen
body:
http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/d/d3/ShenSquare.png http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/2/28/RyzeSquare.png

Please update his ingame icon before it hits live. For clarity reasons.

replies.body: We are going to be adjusting Ryze's icon to make it look less like Shen. Should be on the PBE soon
What about adjusting shen's one? Make it more purple-ish and it should be fine. Also shen's skills are purple, ryze is blue.
Shen always looked blue to me and Ryze purple.

many icons look the same, like these 2

{{champion:107}} {{champion:86}}
Those are some happy little bushes you've got there bob.

not current but it looks just like the old shen :S
http://cdn.staticneo.com/w/leagueoflegends/2/27/ShenIcon.png
Old Shen looks like he just went through a depressing week.
I'm fine with the two yordles, their facing different directions and their white hair and purple skin are different shades. Plus their looking in different directions.
And they're looking in different directions.

It does on the minimap.

http://i.imgur.com/fOYR4Hp.png
what it's just the blue, people must be color blind because I can the difference just fine.

It's a "bald" blue guy with a blue background and shining blue eyes.

If you're looking at your minimap with your peripheral vision you would hardly be able to tell the difference.
I think anybody with a monitor resolution better than potato should be able to clearly tell which icon is which.
